pyCoalesce.utilities.logger module¶

@author: Scott Orr

Unless pyCoalesce.utilities.logger.package_logger is imported by the main app, all log messages for the package are piped to logging.NullHanlder–that is, there’s no output at all.

pyCoalesce.utilities.logger.package_logger = <logging.Logger object>¶

Import this logger and assign a handler to it in order to process log messages from pyCoalesce modules.
